channel.title: wav on 后会有期
channel.description: Recent content in wav on 后会有期

item.title: 4种音频格式转单声道wav.md
item.description: pcm 转 wav system(“sox -t raw -c 1 -s -b 16 -r 16000 $pcmpath -c 1 -s -r 16000 $wavpath”, $return); wav 转 wav system(“ffmpeg -i $sourcepath -acodec pcm_s16le -ac 1 -ar 16000 $wavpath”, $return); mp3 转 wav system(“sox " . $wavpatht . " -r 16000 -c 1 " . $wavpath, $return); m4a 转 wav system(“ffmpeg -i $pcmpath -acodec pcm_s16le -ac 1 -ar 16000 $wavpath”, $return);
